THANK YOU TO ASMAFATIMAMEHDIZAKIA who served us evey morning at breakfast wonderful customer service. The rooms were nice and clean and the beds were very comfortable and they cleaned them evey day. Thank you to the House keeping staff.  Lovely pool area very clean A BIG THANK YOU TO WALID who is in charge of the pool he was very polite and very friendly. He always made sure we had fresh towls and the best seats.  I WOULD LIKE TO THANK ALL THE RECEPTION STAFF  KHALIDLOUBNAJAMALSIHAM etc....  A MILLION THANK YOU TO ZINEB AFFI Guest Relations Senoir  Who was very helpful from the start  A BIG THANK YOU TO ISMAIL  ABIG THANK YOU TO IBTIHAJ INSAF Reservation Team who made my reservation from London.  I would recommend this hotel to any one who wishes to stay in Marakkesh.    Best Regards  - Mohamed At-Tu

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: we have experienced 9 hotels sofar in marrakech every better then before but still some wishes  we think we found now the best one  no searchng anymore  arrival  luggage taken out of the cab and brought to the reception which is on the second floor  before entering the lobby on streetlevel you pas a security gate  and thereare day and night 2 security agents  at thereception a warm welcome ftom loubna teamleader  she informs you about everything and brings you to the room  her collegaue do the paperwork  nice and clean room  very good sound isolated  2 bottleswater soft dades  apples and so on  enough cupboards and a good working frigue  very nice dinner and not to expensive  breakfast buffer very good 4 cheesesloads of sweets fruits and so and so on  very goodservice  hotel is situated in a shopping area  starbucks20 metres away  and at last but not least  shutle service on demand at resonable price  i think we found our ultimate hotel in marrakech
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: Laurence H wrote a review Aug 2016
Review_Text: I have stayed in many five-star hotels around the world and the Radisson Blu Marrakech qualifies as one of the highest quality. At all levels the Staff at this hotel are exceptional their caring attention to every detail is remarkable.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: You are welcomed in the hotel with fresh and beautifully decorated flowers and beautiful plants. The hotel's interior design is truly unique and contemporary. Excellent service. Beautiful rooms. Exceptional reception staff. Lovely pool area. Amazing food with a generous chef. Deluxe breakfast. Can't be missed.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: We had a very bad start in Marrakech and had to change hotels due to hygene issues we had with hotel Ryad Art Palace. We were lucky that Raddison blu had rooms available . From the time we got into the hotel the staf took care of us abd made us feel at home. Customer service like no other. How staff should be. A very good example of those who go out of there way to make you happy. From making customise cocktails to looking up recepices to make for us specially. And a huge shout out to the absolute gorgouse Fathima who served us every morning at breakfast She is very good example of wonderful costumer service with a very friendly personality.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: Samira H wrote a review Aug 2016
Review_Text: The hotel is in the heart of Marrakesh near the main square you don't need transport to go around . It's a modern hotel with Moroccan touch they clean the rooms properly every day.the staff are very friendly and helpful. My kids enjoyed swimming in the pool and I felt safe because the have so many securities. I recommend the hotel for any one who is looking for memorable holiday

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Title: Unbelievable Exponential Experience from "A to Z"
Review_Text: I have been postponing this review for almost 3 weeks as i knew i have to write pages of how wonderful this hotel is.  this hotel is perfectly centered in the most important area of Marrakech.  can can go anywhere to the most of the attractions in Marrakech in less than 10 min.  This hotel is super new so the rooms is super clean and comfortable.    ****STAFF****    Still there is no words in the English dictionary could describe how friendlypolite and willing to help this staff is.  every single employee in this hotel was super friendly. they are all providing the same wonderful level of service in one portrait.  I would like to thank ****Rasheeda**** in the Customer Relations team. Rasheeda helped me and my family almost in everything in Marrakech she went extra mile in every time i ask her for anything.she helped me finding good restaurants in Marrakech and do the bookingbooking all my trips.  she made our stay in Marrakech wonderful and we had the best experience ever.  Also i would like to thank Zienb in Customer Relations as well she helped us a lot and provided the best recommendations for us.    - Rooms    Clean  Comfy and modernly designed    - Breakfast    The breakfast in this hotel its totally different story super freshtasty and you can feel the quality of the food.    I highly recommend this hotel for your stay in Marrakech.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: Dansk:  Dette hotel er nok det bedste hotel jeg nogensinde har boet p√•. Den service de udbyder er i tip top stand. Personalet her er hj√¶lpsomme og ekstrem venlige. De st√•r til r√•dighed d√∏gnet rund og hj√¶lper til udover deres s√¶dvanlige arbejdsopgaver.  Hotellet service er perfekt der bliver virkelig taget h√•nd om en.    V√¶relserne er enorm flotte og rumlige. Der er massere plads til ens personlige ting og samtidig plads til at kunne spadsere rundt. Alt i alt er der intet negativt at sige om dette hotel da de opfylder alle end √∏nsker og krav.    English:  This hotel is probably the best hotel I 've ever stayed in . The service they provide is in tip top condition . The staff here are helpful and extremely friendly . They are available round the clock  and helps in addition to their usual tasks.  The hotel service is perfect there is really taken care of one.    The rooms are beautiful and spatial . There 's plenty room for your personal things while space to walk around . Overall there is nothing negative to say about this hotel as they meet all your wishes and requirements.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: Moha A wrote a review Aug 2016
Review_Text: My wife and I stayed in Radisson Blu hotel Marrakech in July our experience was excellent. The staff were warm welcoming and extremely professional they couldn't do enough for us. The room was very modern and well cleaned. The food was amazing with Moroccan touch particularly the Breakfast buffet. We highly recommend a stay at this hotel. We will definitely return.
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Title: Unplanned visit and it made my day üëåüôè
Review_Text: Back in May 2016 I've noticed new hotel opening and i was interested to see what is the hotel look like as its location is in the heart of Marrakech.    So I had in mind to make sure I stop by the hotel in my current visit to Marrakech. I did today and it was a good experience.    From the security at the door and going up to the 2nd floor where front desk restaurants pool and bar located everyone's seems and looks professional  friendly.    I was seated and listened to Rachida from front desk who made my day. True experienced professional with excellent customer service and handling. She talked me through the hotel group then offered me a tour to see hotel rooms ( without been pushy) the approach was welcoming friendly that I was happy to take the tour and listen to everything she had to say. We met Ilham from the SPA who equally was professional. Finally I decided to set in the pool area and have a coffee. I was served by Zakia who came across professional  friendly attentive. Also Adil.    The property is one of best I've visited in Marrakech. The rooms are excellent size wise and fully equipped.    Certainly I will stay in this Hotle during my current visit or for sure next one in a few months.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Title: Nice clean hotel, great location, helpful staff
Review_Text: We stayed at This hotel for 4 nights. It's a New hotel (2 months).  Rooms are clean and have comfortable size and beautiful design. Beds are very comfortable. Nice bath room.    Nice pollite staff especially Siham and Rachida were very helpful.    The location is great just next to Starbucks and part of the building is a shopping center. The old City the medina is 5-8 minutes' ride in a taxi (10 -20 dirhams).

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: We stayed at Radisson blu Care Eden for seven days.  the hotel is very well located in the heart of the new city centre a lot of shops and restaurants.  The hotel is about 20 minutes walk from the old town.  Our experience at this hotel is beyond what we can express in a review on trip advisor.  As soon as we made the booking the hotel staff were on the top of everything to make sure that our stay goes smoothly.  I would like to thank Rachida in guest relations for the fabulous welcome we have received from her on our arrival but also everything she did for us throughout our stay at this fantastic hotel.  She is truly an asset to this company. THANK YOU RACHIDA.  I would recommend to everyone to try the restaurant at the hotel the food is delicious.  Also try the SPA and the gym you won't regret it.  It feels like a dream when we think back of of our experience.  We will definitely be back.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: salma Z wrote a review Jul 2016
Review_Text: Excellent service excellent food amazing spa and facilities.Excellent value for money and well located. Really cool bar and excellent music! Staff was the most friendliest staff I've ever met in a hotel! Will definitely return to the city and stay there again.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: Jada T wrote a review Jul 2016
Review_Text: Excellent hotel right in the centre of town close to everything. Staff are very attentive and friendly. We arrived quiet early due to an early flight however they allowed us to check in early free of charge. The rooms were very modern clean.  The only minor thing I would say which would improve an already excellent hotel would be a more thorough walk through of the room as we didn't discover some features until we were leaving  I.e how to boost the hot water in the shower  the sliding doors swivelling mirror etc.  Overall a great stay and I would recommend to anyone visiting marrakech!
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: W Din wrote a review Jul 2016
Review_Text: Amazing hotel..beautifull.. Staff were very friendly especially Tariq the duty manager for breakfast..hotel was very clean and in a good location..one of marrakech best hotels will defo be staying here again...    Service was amazing could not find any fault. Anyone looking for 5* then dont look elsewhere.    Mr Din
Reviewer_Trip_Type: Trip type: Traveled as a couple

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: mameesh s wrote a review Jul 2016
Review_Title: Best room service in the word
Review_Text: Very good service quick and very nice food real 5star hotel more better than London from far  I'm happy to stay w my children in this hotel  The restaurant is one of the best places to go in Marrakesh the food and service is really amazing  I recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: Impeccable customer service! Their menu could use English version for non-french speakers. Good cocktail drinks. Friendly staff ready to help with ANYTHING. Rooms are modern yet a good reminder of your presence in Morocco. I would definitely stay there again.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Date: Chrono D wrote a review Jun 2016
Review_Text: A brand new hotel centrally located...just 20 minutes walking distance to the old city or to Yves Saint Laurent Palace - Jardin Majorelle! The room is really big! love the yummy breakfast buffet. All hotel employees are really friendly..especially Loubna from the Front Office!! Thank you for your kindness during our stay. We will definitly come back again very soon.....

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: Recently stayed at Radisson Blu Hotel in Carre Eden with my brother and I must say I have been left speechless!  The whole stay was perfect from the minute we were picked up from the airport by our driver to the minute he dropped us back a week later.    The rooms are absolutely gorgeous. They are very spacious and well decorated: the decor is really modern with a hint of Moroccan design which is really classy!    All facilities are super clean and well kept.    A big plus is that they have a very well equipped gym with a very good PT to train/assist you.    The swimming pool and the gardens are really nice and quiet which is all I needed on my break - tranquility and relax!  Staff are very attentive and they will offer preparing whichever sunbed you want to chill in with a towel and a parasol. Food and beverage is also available to order all around the pool and gardens.    Now... Moving on to the best bit of the stay!! LILA Gueliz: the restaurant!  The buffet breakfast we had included in our stay was awesome! Lots of options to choose from which is thumbs up for those who have dietary requirements etc. You can also order omelettes of your choice which are prepared there and then by the friendly chefs!    We had lunch dinner and brunches at LILA Gueliz restaurant pretty much every day of our stay because we simply couldn't get enough! The food was beautifully presented which is what attracts me most to my meal. Taste was beyond amazing. I'd give the chefs a 100 out of 10 any day!! Definitely a must try.    Entertainment is really nice in the evenings: Live DJs and music!    I had a 45minute relaxing massage treatment at EdenSpa and it was just what I needed. The facilities were really nice and the therapist was really good! All staff at EdenSpa are very friendly and professional. Another big thumbs up!üëçüèº    For those who love flowers like I do Radisson Blu Hotel has an in-house floral designer and boutique called YASSAB. Their creations are beautiful and I couldn't get enough of them! The whole hotel is decorated by their flowers and that's another reason why I fell in love with this place!    The Hotel is in Gueliz which is approximately 10 minutes from Jamaa Lfna Square. Carre Eden Shopping Centre is just literally beneath/behind the hotel which is really handy.    The staff know the area very well and are happy to give directions or arrange travel for you.    Finally last but not least all staff at the hotel were extremely pleasant friendly and professional. Very attentive at all times and happy to help with anything and every thing.  They will make sure you have an amazing stay so do not hesitate to stay at Radisson Blu Hotel Carre Eden.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: From the moment we arrived to Marrakech to the moment we left this hotel look after us; my sister and I. They arranged transfers to the hotel and from the hotel to the airport on a good S class and C Class! The hotel room is great with an amazing product. All the employees were extremely helpful from the doorman concierge reception guest relations driver security and restaurants.  If you are looking to have the best time of your life and Marrakech you should defiantly stay in the Radisson!  I cannot wait to come back this August.

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Text: Just came here for a few drinks one night with a friend  staff couldn't do enough for you absolutely amazing live singer on in a gorgeous setting great atmosphere ended up staying  Most of the night it was that good would like to stay here see what the rooms  Are  Like

Hotel_Name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Marrakech Carre Eden
Review_Title: If you love your fitness, come to this hotel
Review_Text: Why? Because Ali the PT of the gym is very very helpful! He is not the kind of PT who just hang around showing you what's what. He actually train you!  I was worried about not having enough exercise (in definition of doing Bootcamp) while I'm in Marrakech and he tailored a crossfit exercise for me everyday.  I really appreciate his proactiveness and friendliness. He still of course welcome people to the gym when they enter and ask if he can help (so despite my session is always interrupted) I appreciate that he does such things for clients.    I personally think he is the best asset of the hotel. So as I said if you love your fitness come to Radisson Blu Marrakech!    There are a lot of other good aspects of the hotel of course. But Ali is outstanding. The gym itself is one of the biggest I've ever been. It definitely helps with having such an excellent session.    Thank you Ali! I'll definitely come back and it's because of your fitness help! Keep up the good work that you do!
